meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shy.
meanings.sent1: Her shynesses made it hard for her to speak up in class.
meanings.sent2: His shynesses often made him blush when talking to strangers.
meanings.sent3: Despite her shynesses, she managed to give a confident presentation.
meanings.sent4: The shynesses in her demeanor were like a protective shield around her.
meanings.sent5: The shynesses in his eyes revealed his true feelings.

meanings.sent1: The many shynesses she displayed surprised her friends.
meanings.sent2: His shynesses were evident when he avoided eye contact.
meanings.sent3: The shynesses at the party made for some awkward moments.
meanings.sent4: The shynesses in the room were palpable, creating a tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: Each of her shynesses seemed to melt away as she gained confidence.
